description:
Show off your trail builder cred. Moisture-wicking tech keeps things comfortable, and a drop-back hem means the back won’t ride up under a pack or during a big-air move.

  • Moisture wicking Cool Wik polyester is breathable and soft to the touch
  • Raglan sleeves give you unrestricted range of motion
  • Drop back hem adds coverage
  • Tapered fit is subtly feminine
name: Sombrio Grom's SE Alder Jersey - Girls' - Youths
